name: Savi Technology
overview: Savi Technology, Inc. provides radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions for the management and security of supply chain assets, shipments, and consignments. The companyâ€™s products and services include RFID-data collection, asset and sensor tags, security, readers, signposts, SmartChain software suite, SmartChain middleware, site manager, mobile manager, client tools, and SmartChain applications; and consulting, information, support, and education services. It also offers UnwiredPlanet, a patent licensing program. In addition, the companyâ€™s solutions include chemical chain of custody, defense asset management, defense consignment, RFID network management, retail asset management, and supply chain asset management. It serves shippers, manufacturers, chemical companies, and retailers, as well as ports, railroads, terminal operators, carriers, asset owners, and third party logistics providers. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Mountain View, California with additional offices in Johannesburg, South Africa; London, England; Melbourne, Australia; Singapore; and Washington, District of Columbia. As of June 8, 2006, Savi Technology, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Savi Group.
